meta.title: Privacy Policy - Optimizo
meta.description: Learn how Optimizo protects your privacy and handles your data.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.content: Optimizo is designed with privacy in mind. Most of our tools process data entirely in your browser without sending information to our servers. We may collect:
items: Usage Data: Anonymous analytics about how you use our tools
Technical Data: Browser type, device information, and IP address
Contact Information: Only if you voluntarily submit it through our contact form

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
2.content: We use the collected information to:
items: Respond to your inquiries and support requests

3.title: 3. Data Processing
3.client_side: Client-Side Processing: Most tools (Word Counter, Image Compressor, Base64 Encoder, etc.) process your data entirely in your browser. Your files and text never leave your device.
3.server_side: Server-Side Tools: Some tools (like YouTube tools, WHOIS Lookup) require server processing. Data sent to our servers is processed immediately and not stored permanently.

4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking
4.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
5.content: We may use third-party services for analytics and functionality. These services have their own privacy policies. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

6.title: 6. Data Security
6.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

7.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Object to processing of your data

8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
8.content: Our Service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

9.title: 9. Changes to Privacy Policy
9.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

10.title: 10. Contact Us
10.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please {link}.

meta.title: Terms & Conditions - Optimizo
meta.description: Read our terms and conditions for using Optimizo online tools.

1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
1.content: By accessing and using Optimizo ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms & Conditions, please do not use our Service.

2.title: 2. Use of Service
2.content: Optimizo provides free online tools for various purposes including YouTube tools, SEO tools, network tools, and utility tools. You agree to use these tools:
items: In accordance with these Terms & Conditions
Without violating any applicable laws or regulations
Without infringing on the rights of others

3.title: 3. Privacy and Data
3.content: We respect your privacy. All tools process data client-side in your browser whenever possible. We do not store or collect your personal data unless explicitly stated. Please refer to our {link} for more information.

4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
4.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Optimizo and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

5.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranties
5.content: The Service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
6.content: In no event shall Optimizo, its directors, employees, or agents be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of the Service.

7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
7.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any changes by updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the Service after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

8.title: 8. Contact Us
8.content: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please {link}.

meta.title: About Us - Optimizo
meta.description: Learn about Optimizo and our mission to provide free, fast, and privacy-focused online tools.

hero.title: About Optimizo
hero.subtitle: Free, Fast, and Privacy-Focused Online Tools

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Optimizo was created with a simple mission: to provide powerful, easy-to-use online tools that respect your privacy and don't require registration or payment. We believe everyone should have access to professional-grade tools without compromising their data or privacy.
mission.p2: Whether you're a content creator, developer, SEO professional, or just someone who needs quick online tools, Optimizo has you covered with a comprehensive suite of utilities designed to make your work easier and faster.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: Most tools process data entirely in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.desc: Optimized for speed with instant results and no waiting times.

free.title: 100% Free
free.desc: All tools are completely free with no hidden fees or premium tiers.

no_reg.title: No Registration
no_reg.desc: Use any tool instantly without creating an account or signing up.
